item.title: ps_supplierlist - Configure Settings
item.description: ps_supplierlist - Configure Settings Details Status : [TEST] To be automated Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-7274 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO> Modules> Module Manager Module Manager page is well displayed Search supplierlist module Supplier list module is displayed in Design & Navigation result Click on Configure module button Configure / Supplier list page is well displayed Edit type of display, save. The settings have been updated. message is displayed Go to FO> All products The search filter suppliers is displayed with a drop-down list on the left column.
